Address.value: 18/F OVEST,77 WING LOK STREET, SHEUNG WAN, Hong Kong

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Established in 2012 and headquartered in Guangzhou, China, Baird Medical is a leading microwave ablation ("MWA") medical device manufacturer and provider in China (and a recent entrant to the United States market). Baird Medical's proprietary medical devices are used for the treatment of benign and malignant tumors including thyroid nodules, liver cancer, lung cancer and breast lumps. Baird Medical is the first company to obtain a Class III medical devices registration certificate for MWA medical devices specifically indicated for thyroid nodules in China.
